sourcesContent:
import { AfterViewInit, Component, ElementRef, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import anime from 'animejs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.scss'], }) export class MenuComponent implements AfterViewInit { @ViewChild('svgTemplate') svgTemplate!: ElementRef; constructor() {} ngAfterViewInit(): void { const svgPath = this.svgTemplate.nativeElement.querySelector('.path'); anime({ targets: svgPath, loop: true, direction: 'alternate', strokeDashoffset: [anime.setDashoffset, 0], easing: 'easeInOutSine', duration: 1700, delay: (el, i) => { return i * 500; }, }); } }
